grib_api Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
grib_find_nearestFind the nearest point/points of a given latitude/longitude point
grib_getGet the value for a key from a grib message
grib_get_dataGet latitude/longitude and data values
grib_get_elementGet a value of specified index from an array key
grib_get_sizeGet the size of an array key
grib_index_getGet the distinct values of the key in argument contained in the index
grib_index_get_sizeGet the number of distinct values of the key in argument contained in the index
grib_index_selectSelect the message subset with key==value
grib_setSet the value for a key in a grib message
